name: Ball Block Gravity: Cubes that disappear
name_original: Ball Block Gravity: Cubes that disappear
description:
In this game, you can Touch the cubes to Destroy them and lead your path towards the next level. This game has destroyable blocks, swings, lifts, gravity objects, etc. You can use these Objects to progress in the game.

This is a different type of game in which you did not have any control over the ball, but the environment that allows you to win the game.
So, go through the levels and have fun.
This game comes in these genres:
ball games 3d , ball games 3d 2019, Balance Ball 3d, ball block puzzle, all 3d ball games
